settings.label: Our Story
settings.heading: Built For Those Who Move With Purpose
settings.hero_text: Athyre was born from the belief that what we wear shapes how we move, think, and show up in the world.
settings.story_text:
We started with a simple question: why can't activewear be beautiful, sustainable, and high-performing all at once? That question became our mission.

Every piece is designed in-house, tested in the real world, and crafted from materials that honor both your body and the planet.
settings.founder_quote: We build for the ones who refuse to choose between looking good and doing good.

settings.title: Performance
settings.text: Every fabric is tested in motion. If it doesn't perform, it doesn't ship.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.text: Mindful sourcing, responsible production, minimal waste.

settings.title: Community
settings.text: Built by and for people who move with intention.

settings.title: Design
settings.text: Clean aesthetics that transition from studio to street.
